title: Easy Korean for Beginners - Grammar
headline: This free online course teaches how to use general Korean phrases and understand the Korean number system.
description: Jal-jiness-eoyo? Have you picked up a few Korean words through K-Pop and K-Dramas? Do you want to learn how to converse in Korean? This course is designed to take your Korean skills to the next level. You will gain insight into the Korean grammar structure and understand the underlying logic and how it differs from English. You will then expand your vocabulary, create phrases and master grammar proficiently in Korean.
courseDescription:
Do you only know a few Korean words but don’t know how to make phrases? Are you confused about the Korean numbers system? Learning grammar is one of the first steps to understanding any language. For that, we begin with the basic building block of speech - nouns - called 명사 (myeong-sa) in Korean. Once you know them, you are on your way to easily make phrases or simple sentences.

After the basics, we will dive into the Korean adjectives with which we will build sentences and make daily conversations. First, adjectives will give us a description of the nouns. For example, you will use the Korean adjective + Korean noun form to build a sentence using a noun. Then, comparing adjectives will give you a detailed description of what the speaker is saying. For example: for good, better, best you say 좋아요, 더 좋아요, 제일 좋아요.

We will then cover the two Korean number systems: the Native Korean numbers and the Sino-Korean numbers. You will gain insight into the specific uses for each system, whether you are counting things, currency or time. This Korean language course is intended for beginners with carefully planned topics to help anyone understand the language. If you want to master the grammar and study how to make conversations, join this course and continue your journey to learn Korean today.
